content: in this legal case a court has reached a final decision regarding the division of joint assets between two parties referred to as v ka and ai the court has ordered that ai will be the sole owner of two apartment properties and a car while the parties will have joint liability for a loan agreement the court has also awarded compensation of 931038 euros to v ka v ka is required to declare their intent to be a part owner of one of the apartment properties the court has determined that the defendant is responsible for loan payments and has fulfilled their obligation the court has rejected the claim to divide a garage box as part of the joint assets the court has awarded the claimant half of the rental income from an apartment as compensation the court has also calculated compensation for excess joint assets and loan obligations awarding 931038 euros to the defendant the court has ordered the necessary changes to be made in the land registry and mentioned the payment of compensation and distribution of procedural costs
